name: Creature E.P. - 2012
description:
::: OUT NOW :::

Backhand Saloon's second E.P. 'Creature'

Featuring Tracks:
1. Cassiopeia
2. Creature
3. Thorns
4. Prometheus
5. Mora
6. Acid Fang

Presented in a shrink wrapped Digi-File card case. Disc and card case are fully printed front and back.

Orders will be shipped on or after 31st August.

Image contains actual photos of the CD and packaging, Front and Back covers are shown shrink wrapped.

Artwork © Bill Giles
cargocollective.com/billgilesillustration

-

Backhand Saloon's first E.P. 'Crooks & Curses' is still available, please Email backhandsaloon@googlemail.com for more info or visit the merch stand at out next show 

Featuring Tracks:
1. Curses
2. Brinks Mat
3. Tempest
4. Disaster Is My Name 

Disc and card case are fully printed, card case printed front and back.

name: 'Creature' - Bundle
description:
The 'Creature' Bundle includes the following;

x1 'Creature' E.P.  
x1 'Mora' T-Shirt 
x1 Limited edition 'Mora' Poster - Only 50 available, these posters will not be reprinted. Each poster is individually numbered 1 to 50.
'Mora' poster contains artwork by © Bill Giles screen printed on quality A3 paper. 

Please note this bundle is limited to 50. So grab a bundle before they are all sold out.

cargocollective.com/billgilesillustration
